mapper.select: SELECT CATID, CATNAME FROM JYCAT WHERE CATID!=0

SELECT C.CATID, CATNAME, RNUM, B.CATCOUNT FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY CATID ASC) AS RNUM, CATID, CATNAME FROM JYCAT WHERE CATID != 0 ) C INNER JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(CATID) AS CATCOUNT, CATID FROM JYBOARD WHERE CATID != 0 AND NOTICE = 0 AND DEL = 0 AND SYSDATE - WDATE <= 7 GROUP BY CATID ) B ON C.CATID = B.CATID WHERE RNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 5 ORDER BY CATCOUNT DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO JYCAT(CATID, CATNAME) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(CATID),0)+1 FROM JYCAT), #{catname})
